Today in Pembrokeshire, St Brides Bay and Tenby are both offering fun 2 ft @ 7s S with light 10 mph ENE winds, making for clean conditions. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 6s SE, and the wind remains at 10 mph NE, leading to less favorable surf.
